item.title: Linkin Park looking to leave label
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "The band has issued a statement saying the new owners will reap big awards from an initial public offering but no money will be given to the artists." "Linkin Park owes Warner Music four more albums, but the band says they're looking into releasing music over the Internet and it does not plan to deliver a new album to Warner." Read full article (Link courtesy of Christine)
